Title: Det. Dave Majors
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Gabe Liedman, Lakshmi Sundaram, Gabe Liedman (executive story editor), Lakshmi Sundaram (executive story editor), Matt O'Brien (executive story editor), Brigitte Liebowitz (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Jake is jealous when a detective from another precinct wants to ask Amy out on a date. Linetti and Boyle try to keep Jeffords from taking a job with a private firm, but captain Holt seems to be pushing him out the door.
